title: About Drivepage and store
body:
Hi there. I've noticed there is a drivepage when the project uploaded to cf pages. So, is there any ways to edit the files that uploaded to the driver? I'm wondering because there is no button to edit or even remove the files uploaded to it. 
Could you please give some ideas about it. Sincerely thank you for your help.
author: FrenTim

comments.body:
Cannot delete or edit. the file list is stored in the browser, but u cannot delete files in ipfs.
The best way to clear ur file list is to delete the website's cookies.

I understand it now. So, the files were uploaded to ipfs. I am reading the document of ipfs to gain more informations. Thank you for answering me, I'm going to seek more about all these intresting projects. Wish you have a relaxing day/time. ^_^

title: Blocked Sites
body:
There's an issue with some Sites that they block cloudflare IPs even if they're not using cloudlfare's CDNs .
Is there any ways to force these kind of sites going through Proxyip?
I'd suppose you're already aware of Twitch.tv Source quality issue , there are many more websites that are unable to be reached using cloudflare IPs.
So please add an option to redirect these sites through proxyIP.
Thank you !
author: Ahmad-2213

comments.body: proxyIP only accept website using Cloudflare's CDN.

so there is no soloution to this problem?
I've got one more unrelated question which is about the Socks5 Project you've forked.
I tried it and gave me better ping time compared to vless Edge tunnel.
big problem is the dns is resolved directly which causes the Firewall to block the request.
will you consider an update to fix the issue? , if so, will it become compatible with v2ray client?
Set the SOCKS5 variable SOCKS5_RELAY set to true and all traffic will through the socks5 server
is there any ways to add udp to code, does cloudflare now supports udp and mux?
vless or socks5 as outbound will support udp

title: 是不是只有socks5分支才能使用sock5 proxyip？
body: 是不是只有socks5分支才能使用sock5 proxyip？
author: anglesccs
